text: @realDonaldTrump 101,100+ Americans are dead. And whatever economic recovery we might have is probably going to be sabotaged and ruined by your brain-dead policies with regard to covid-19 by causing spikes in the disease because you can't deal with anything honestly or accept responsibility.
